code: import{BoardObject}from"../../../domain/board";import{PieceColor}from"../../../domain/piece";/** Only compares the 2 boards and opponents*/export var areGameStatesEqual=function areGameStatesEqual(game1,game2){return game1.board.toString()===game2.board.toString()&&game1.opponent_username==game2.opponent_username;};function defaultGameState(){return{board:new BoardObject(),winner:null,local_pieces:PieceColor.WHITE};}var GameState={areGameStatesEqual:areGameStatesEqual,defaultGameState:defaultGameState};export default GameState;
